original: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na aupekkhā sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ na kusalo

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā upekkhā sahagatam kusalañca na aupekkhā sahagatam kusalañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na upekkhā sahagatam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā upekkhā sahagatam akusalañca na upekkhā sahagatam akusalañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā
tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam paccaya vasena
